sense.def:
A gloss
je lesk na površini.

seg.quote: The wood has a high gloss.

sense.def:
To gloss over a problem or mistake
pomeni potruditi se, da bi bila neka težava ali napaka videti nepomembna, tako da se ne zmenimo zanjo ali zelo na hitro opravimo z njo.

seg.quote: ...callously glossing over the facts of misery and malnutrition.
